markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Shield 0"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Hide Shield](/Shields.aspx?ID=11)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Deflecting Bludgeoning" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=473" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 20 <sup>1.1</sup></row>

<row gap="medium">
**Price** 2 gp

**AC Bonus** 2 

**Speed Penalty** —
</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Bulk** 1

**Hardness** 4

**HP (BT)** 20 (10)
</row>

</column>

---

Hide shields come in a variety of shapes and sizes. Specialized tanning techniques combined with tough hides from creatures such as [owlbears](/Monsters.aspx?ID=328) result in these particularly tough shields. The hardened hide of the shield still has enough flexibility to diminish the impact of battering and pummeling attacks.
name: Hide Shield
